FAQs & Facts About Alok Kumar Suman:

Where was Alok Kumar Suman born?

Alok Kumar Suman was born in Jadopur Dukhaharan, Gopalganj, Bihar.

What is Alok Kumar Suman educational background?

Alok Kumar Suman holds a M.B.B.S., M.S. (General Surgery). He pursued his education at Educated at Patna Medical College, Patna University, Patna, Bihar.

When did Alok Kumar Suman get married?

Alok Kumar Suman got Married

Date of Marriage : 06 Aug 1989

Spouse’s Name : Smt. Kumari Savita.

How many children does Alok Kumar Suman have?

Alok Kumar Suman has Son : 2

Daughter : 0.

Which political party does Alok Kumar Suman belong to?

Alok Kumar Suman political affiliation is with the Janata Dal (United).
